actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 102-609, by Mr. Derrick.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 5427 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. All points of order against provisions in the bill for failure to comply with clause 2 or 6 or rule XXI are waived. Measure will be read by section. Specified amendments are in order. The amendment printed in section 2 of this resolution shall be considered as adopted in the House and in the Committee of the Whole. No other amendment shall be in order except the amendments printed in the report of the Committee on Rules accompanying this resolution. Said amendments shall be considered in the order and manner specified in said report.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 156.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 254 - 171 (Roll no. 223).
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 244 - 179 (Roll no. 224).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5427) making appropriations for the Legislative Branch for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1993, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 5427 (Legislative Branch appropriations).

titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5427) making appropriations for the Legislative Branch for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1993, and for other purposes.
